title: 3D Virtual Tour - Studio, 1 BA Apartment 423 Sq. Ft. - Washer/Dryer
posting_body: Financial District - Studio, 1 BA Apartment 423 Sq.
Originally known as the Langerman's Tobacco and Segar Warehouse built in the 1850's, the Belli Building is more famously known as the Law Offices of Melvin Belli.

It is said that after successfully litigating notorious personal injury cases for celebrities such as Chuck Berry, Muhammad Ali, and the Rolling Stones, Belli would raise a Jolly Roger flag over his office building and fire a cannon, mounted on his office roof, to announce the victory.
Today, this San Francisco Landmark has been fully restored and renovated to offer modern and comfortable living.
The new "Landmark 9" residences offer spacious living areas, high end appliances, and luxury finishes within a secured building.
This Jackson Square Location offers endless neighborhood options for great dining, watering holes, and coffee shops.

Also known as San Francisco's Interior Design District, Jackson square is surrounded by 25+ furniture and decorative art galleries, advertising agencies, architects and industrial or graphic designers.
•Large storage cages in the basement at an additional cost
•Access to the building from Montgomery St. and Hotaling Alley with CCTV intercom for buzzer guest entry
Schedule Appointment through 'Contact Us' on the Property Page:
Showing Guidelines Will Be Sent After a Completed Guest Card
•Applicant(s) Must Physically View the Unit Prior to Submitting Application(s)
•FaceTime, Skype, Zoom, or Any Other Virtual Viewing Platform/Resource Is Not Accepted as a Replacement of Physical Viewings
Applicant(s) Must Attend Viewing Together Prior to Submitting Individual Applications
Applications Will Be Reviewed Once All Intended Residents Have Attended Viewing Together & Submitted An Application
•Marketing of This Unit Will Continue Until We’ve Received Move-in Funds From an Executed Lease
•Security Deposit Equivalent to One Month Rent
•Non Refundable Building Move-In Fee of $300/Move-Out Fee of $300.
